decoder.name: custom-cisco-asa-auth
decoder.regex: %ASA-auth-(\d+)-(\d+): Group = (\S+), Username = (\S+), IP = (\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+), Session (\S+). Session Typ$ severity,id,group,user,srcip,status,protocol,duration,byte,byte_rcv,reason

decoder.name: custom-cisco-asa-add
decoder.regex: %ASA--(\d+)-(\d+): user-identity: Add IP-User mapping (\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+) - (\S+) Succeeded - VPN user</rege$ severity,id,srcip,domain

decoder.name: custom-cisco-asa-del
decoder.regex: %ASA--(\d+)-(\d+): user-identity: Delete IP-user mapping (\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+) - (\S+) Succeeded - (\S+\s+\S+\$ severity,id,srcip,domain,action

decoder.name: custom-asa-connect
decoder.regex: %ASA-svc-(\d+)-(\d+): Group (\S+) User (\S+) IP (\p+\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+\p+) IPv4 Address (\p+\d+.\d+.\d+.\d+\p$ severity,id,group,user,srcip,dstip
